segments.speaker: bird
segments.text: It looks like TargenCorp are beginning to learn.

segments.speaker: bird
segments.text: They've managed to make some compu-nodes that your scanner isn't able to access.

segments.speaker: bird
segments.text: Fortunately, an ether transmission from another hacked node should do the job.

segments.speaker: bird
segments.text: Use one of the hackable compu-nodes to hit the unhackable node.
